alert.note: Alert for Door; Southern Marinette County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 14 at 2:47PM CDT until March 14 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...SIGNIFICANT BAND OF SNOW EXPECTED OVER NORTHERN WISCONSIN THROUGH EARLY THIS EVENING... .A band of snow will impact parts of central and northern Wisconsin through early this evening. The snow may become heavy at times within a narrow band, with snowfall rates of an inch per hour possible. Areas from Marathon to Door County will likely be the most impacted. Snow covered roads and poor visibility will result in hazardous travel conditions. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. * WHERE...Door and Southern Marinette County Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
